short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves your spot in a YouTube video when exiting the tab so you can return later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves your spot in a YouTube video when exiting the tab so you can return later. The spot you left off will save for 24 hours.

YouTube has somewhat of a built in feature, but it does not always work for certain browsers and is not reliable.
